title: Digital Cop A Digital Cop's Guide to Cyber Security (gnv64)
description: Digital Cop: A Digital Cop's Guide to Cyber Security by Arun Soni, Sahil Baghla Notion Press | March 2017 | ISBN: 978-93-5206-128-0 | ePUB/MOBI | 14.4/7.75 mb Authors who are ardent techies, share their innate wisdom on protecting yourself and your family from certain vices of technology. They also show us how to make the most of it! With just a little help from our trusty computers and smart phones, the duo educate us on a variety of practical applications and online safeguards to help us get the best out of technology and not get beat down by it. CONTENTS 1. The benefits of purchasing an antivirus software 2. Scanning a file with multiple genuine antivirus software free of cost 3. Find out what other people are doing on your computer in your absence 4. Storing and accessing your data anywhere and at anytime without requiring physical storage media devices like pen drives or CDs/DVDs 5. How to send a self-destructing email 6. How to escape from a situation by using your smartphone smartly 7. How to detect a hidden spy camera around you 8. Securing your family by tracking them using GPS 9. How to recover data from a formatted pen drive/hard disk 10. How to permanently delete data so that it is not recoverable 11. Protecting your child from pornographic and non-family friendly websites 12. Internet time machine to view old web pages 13. How to genuinely earn money online 14. How to block annoying Ads on a webpage 15. OMG! Do you know what Google records about you and what you have searched for in the past? 16. How to stop Google recording your search history 17. How to use your saved bookmarks on the Chrome browser on your other PC 18. How to know if a website you are visiting is safe or not 19. How to know your internet identity: The Public IP Address 20. How to track the source location of any email 21. How to know that the recipient has read your email 22. How to know if anybody is reading your confidential emails 23. How to make your email hack proof with your mobile phone 24. How to make youraccount hack proof by your mobile phone 25. Reporting tofor violations like fake accounts, abusive comments and spam 26. How to block particular websites on a computer 27. How to secure your website from being hacked 28. How to secure your Wi-Fi network at home and at the office 29. Do you want to trace your lost or stolen smartphone/laptop? 30. How to make your Android smartphone hack proof for using on any public Wi-Fi connection 31. Securing ATM banking transactions 32. Protecting you from online credit or debit card(s) hacking 33. Final tips to secure your virtual life to be a Digital Cop 34. Best security apps which every woman should install in her smartphone 35. Reporting a Cyber Crime by contacting the Internet Police or Cyber Crime cell https://s9.postimg.org/57515ggr3/Digital_Cop_-_A_Digital_Cop_s_Guide_to_Cyber_Security.jpg
